title: 1 BD, Breakfast bars available, in North Las Vegas NV
posting_body: ['1 BD | 1 BA | 620 SQFT', 'Whether you invite friends over for a day at the pool or to show off your grill-master skills in the barbecue pavilion, Azures Apartment Homes embraces laid-back luxury and the modern comforts of today.', 'Our spacious apartment homes are outfitted with luxe details from wood-style flooring to stone countertops.', 'Plus, residents enjoy an array of indoor and outdoor amenities including a gym and fully equipped resident social lounge.', 'Apartment Features:', 'Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas
